fsfenix-page.page-subtitle: The FS FENIX represents our first realized effort to build a Formula Student car

contacts-page.fill-all-fields: Fill the form below to contact us

team-page.title: Meet the NFS Team!
team-page.description: Our team is made up by student from a wide range of areas of study and from various NOVA Faculties.We are structured in major departments: Board, Technical and Bussiness & Strategy.

home.fs_team: We are the Formula Student team from NOVA University of Lisbon.
home.team_desc:
Students passionate about automotive engineering from NOVA University of Lisbon.

Our focus is to compete in Formula Student, building an innovative car.

We aim to learn, compete, and demonstrate technical skills at events. We have 47 people on the team from 3 different faculties. Divided into 2 main areas: Technical and Non-Technical, which are further divided into 5 and 7 areas respectively.
home.sponsor_title_2: Torne-se Nosso Parceiro na Inovação Automóvel!
home.sponsor_text:
Become a sponsor of our team, having the opportunity to associate with an innovative and educational project.

Increasing your brand's visibility at events, social media, and promotional materials.

Join us on this journey of technical excellence and commitment to innovation.

Support the next generation of leaders and innovators.
